languages.text: {n}Дознаватель удрученно молчит.{/n} "Я прошу прощения. Честно говоря, на дознание я в своей жизни звал чаще, чем на свидания".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель удрученно молчит.{/n} "Я прошу прощения. Честно говоря, на дознание я в своей жизни звал чаще, чем на свидания".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix looks crestfallen.{/n} "I apologise. The truth is that I have had a lot more experience summoning people to interrogations. Extending personal invitations is new territory."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель удрученно молчит.{/n} "Я прошу прощения. Честно говоря, на дознание я в своей жизни звал чаще, чем на свидания".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix looks crestfallen.{/n} "I apologise. The truth is that I have had a lot more experience summoning people to interrogations. Inviting someone on a date is new territory."
{n}Heinrix looks crestfallen.{/n} "I apologise. The truth is that I have had a lot more experience summoning people to interrogations. Inviting someone on a date is new territory."
{n}Heinrix looks crestfallen.{/n} "I apologise. The truth is that I have had a lot more experience summoning people to interrogations. Inviting someone on a date is new territory."
{n}Heinrix looks crestfallen.{/n} "I apologise. The truth is that I have had a lot more experience summoning people to interrogations. Extending personal invitations is new territory."

languages.text: {n}海因里希看起来很沮丧。{/n}“我很抱歉。老实说，我传唤审讯的经验非常丰富，但私下里邀请别人还是第一次。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks crestfallen.{/n} "I apologise. The truth is that I have had a lot more experience summoning people to interrogations. Extending personal invitations is new territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看起来很沮丧。{/n}“我很抱歉。老实说，我传唤审讯的经验非常丰富，但邀请别人约会还是第一次。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix parece alicaído.{/n} «Lo lamento. A decir verdad, tengo mucha más experiencia en convocar a la gente para interrogarla. Lo de las invitaciones personales es nuevo para mí».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks crestfallen.{/n} "I apologise. The truth is that I have had a lot more experience summoning people to interrogations. Extending personal invitations is new territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix parece alicaído.{/n} «Lo lamento. A decir verdad, tengo mucha más experiencia en convocar a la gente para interrogarla. Esto de pedir una cita es nuevo para mí».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、しゅんと肩を落とす。{/n}「すまない。人を尋問に呼び出した経験は山ほどあるが、個人的に人を誘うなんて新たな経験なんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks crestfallen.{/n} "I apologise. The truth is that I have had a lot more experience summoning people to interrogations. Extending personal invitations is new territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、しゅんと肩を落とす。{/n}「すまない。人を尋問に呼び出した経験は山ほどあるが、個人的に人を誘うなんて新たな経験なんだ」

languages.text: « Veuillez m'excuser, {n}dit Heinrix, l'air abattu.{/n} Pour être honnête, j'ai plus l'habitude d'envoyer des convocations pour des interrogatoires que des invitations à un rendez-vous galant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks crestfallen.{/n} "I apologise. The truth is that I have had a lot more experience summoning people to interrogations. Extending personal invitations is new territory."

traits.locale_text: « Veuillez m'excuser, {n}dit Heinrix, l'air abattu.{/n} Pour être honnête, j'ai plus l'habitude d'envoyer des convocations pour des interrogatoires que des invitations à un rendez-vous galant. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix wirkt niedergeschlagen.{/n} "Ich bitte um Verzeihung. Es ist nun mal so, dass ich viel erfahrener darin bin, jemanden zum Verhör zu rufen. Persönliches Einladungen sind für mich Neuland."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks crestfallen.{/n} "I apologise. The truth is that I have had a lot more experience summoning people to interrogations. Extending personal invitations is new territory."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wirkt niedergeschlagen.{/n} "Ich bitte um Verzeihung. Es ist nun mal so, dass ich viel erfahrener darin bin, jemanden zum Verhör zu rufen. Persönliches Einladungen sind für mich Neuland."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, hüsrana uğramış görünüyor.{/n} "Özür dilerim. Hakikat şu ki insanları sorguya çağırma hususunda çok daha fazla tecrübem oldu. Şahsi davetlerde bulunmak, benim için yeni bir şey."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks crestfallen.{/n} "I apologise. The truth is that I have had a lot more experience summoning people to interrogations. Extending personal invitations is new territory."
